issue.title: [MATLAB] add support for converting MATLAB numeric arrays to arrow::NumericArrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a C++ function that accepts a MALTAB uint64 array and converts it into a arrow::NumericArray<arrow::UInt64Type>.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12349?focusedCommentId=17565757) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
